title: Drawing, "Ten Lunettes with Muse and Mnemosine", 1805
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink: 10 melmosine; Clio 1 storia; 2 Melpomene Tragedia; Comedia Talia 3; 4 Euterpe musica; 5 Tersicore danza; erato 6 poesia; 7 Calliope eloquenza; 8 Urania astronomia, Polimnia 9 rettorica
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Ten Lunettes with Muse and Mnemosine", 1805. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3471.
